text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…Mirako-senpaiiii? It's me, Dantsu. 
…Can I come in…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Nghhhhhhhhhhhhhhh, Dantsu-chaaaaaan……!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Whoa! There's a big ol' bed lump… Actually, is that you in there, senpai? Doesn't that feel bad…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… Feels pretty bad… 
But, I mean… I mean, I——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I was such a jerk to Kei-chan…!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I didn't even try to understand how she felt. 
I didn't think about how she used to be sick, or how she had to stay at the hospital for so long. At all.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I didn't think about how many fun plans she's had to cancel from being sick… How she's had to deal with it for so long, she's gotten used to it…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: A normal person like me could never understand what she's going through… So what right do I have to be tell her anything…!?

text_block_list.name: Danstu Flame
text_block_list.text: …But…

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
If you think about it… If you had to cancel a group trip, and the other person going didn't seem to care about it… 
Any normal person would feel lonely, right, Mirako-senpai?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…So, what's wrong with being normal? 
——I like you just the way you are.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huh… Dantsu-chan…?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
At the very least… 
There's been so many times you've made me feel better just by being you.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
When I first enrolled—— To be honest, I was rushing myself. 
This school's the best of the best, and I was so worried about getting left behind…

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
No matter where I looked, everyone around me was so incredible. 
And so I panicked. I starting pushing myself too hard. 
…Haha, the school nurse got pretty upset with me.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: But——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh, welcome back, Dantsu-chan. Did you see what they're serving for dessert tomorrow? No-bake cheesecake with plenty of berry sauce, can you believe it～♪?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Diet plans? Me? Uh～ Well… 
My scrimmages aren't until next month, sooooo how about I cut just one kilo before then…? I can do that, right? I guess?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Aw, man～ Forget this! I go to class, I go to training, I do all that and now I've got English homework too! 
Nope, nope, nooooope! I just wanna read mangaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Whenever I came back to our room, senpai, you would always… ALWAYS be there, being your normal, comforting, self.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Before I knew it, I'd stopped rushing. 
Because you were there for me every day, to tell me "welcome back" in the same old way.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what Miracle-senpai is going through, either. 
But—— That doesn't mean there's nothing we can do for her.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: We're just plain old us, so we might not understand what she's going through. But there has to be something only a couple of normal girls like us can do—— I know there is.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Dantsu-chan… 
……………

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So, um… 
…I can't stand leaving things like this. 
It's only normal to feel that way, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I've got a little favor to ask… Is that okay?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——Huh? 
Light O, Durandal… What are you guys doing here?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Ruby-san is in our class. She informed us that you would be here today. …How is your health? Are you well again?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, just about. 
…Sorry for ruining everything. 
You guys ended up cancelling the trip, right…?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
And I must've really upset Kuu-chan… 
How could she ever forgive me… 
If there's anything I can do to make up for it——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: What are you talking about? You are bringing up ancient history. Anyway Kei-chan we are going on vacation today starting right now.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Dantsu-san and Hishi Miracle-san took the initiative to seek the dorm leader's approval, and made all manner of preparations.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: That is to say, tonight we stay in the Ritto Dorm's sunroom—— On a vacation, as it were. If I understand correctly, if we deem it a vacation, then that makes it a vacation.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
O-oh, so that's how things played out…? 
…But… I couldn't——

text_block_list.name: Miracle and Light O
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but I can't—— 
LET'S RUN ! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: …Come again?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: I said let's run. ——Kei-chan you said you were all better right. Then let's go run. Now.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: The finish line we will figure out on the way and by we will I mean Durandal will. Okay are you ready 3 2 1 GO!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Wh— 
Light O—!?
